thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 19 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's IDFC Bank Dec-Qtr Profit Falls About 24 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's IDFC Bank Dec-Qtr Profit Falls About 24 Pct
text:
Jan 19 (Reuters) - IDFC Bank Ltd:
* DEC QUARTER NET PROFIT 1.46 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 1.91 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER INTEREST EARNED 22.84 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 22.51 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER PROVISIONS AND CONTIGENCIES 1.09 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 2.32 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER NET NPA 2.52 PERCENT VERSUS 1.61 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER
* DEC QUARTER GROSS NPA 5.62 PERCENT VERSUS 3.92 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER Source text - bit.ly/2mV8g6A Further company coverage:
